name: images-to-pdf
description: combines images into a single PDF

scripts.test: eslint --config .eslintrc.json *.js && nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 node test/test.js && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: mLuby <mLuby@users.noreply.github.com>
